MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
Epworth Sleepiness Scale

References:
Johns, M.W. (1991) A New Method for Measuring Daytime Sleepiness: The Epworth Sleepiness Scale. Sleep, 14(6): 540-545
Bloch, K.E., Schoch, O.D., Zhang, J.N., Russi, E.W. (1999) German version of the Epworth Sleepiness Scale. Respiration, 66(5): 440-447

ESS_summary_sum.Description: Assessing 'the subject's general level of daytime sleepiness' (Johns, 1991, page 540).
